Peru

Data from July 2015

Currency: Soles (1 USD = ~3.1 soles)

Tipping: 1-2 soles at small restaurants, 10% at fancier

SIM Card: Get at any Claro / Movistar. Add money anywhere with “recarga aqui” signs. Data plane ~35 soles per 750MB.

Drinking: 18+ (not heavily enforced)

Washrooms: Bring own toilet paper. Throw used toilet paper in trash, it clogs the toilet.

Tourist Visa: None for US/Canada. Others: here

Content 2
Content 3
Content 4

Aguas Caliente (Machu Pichhu) <-> Cusco

By train: ~$100, 3 hour bus to Ollantaytambo, then 1.5 hour train

By bus: ~15, 7 hour bus to Hiedroelectrica, then 2 hour walk
